Divorce laws a money making machine for women – A womans perspective on men who suffer – Myra
People are fighting in courts for over 10 years to end a broken marriage.. Is it ever going to be the same again? Irretrievable breakdown of marriage is a law which is a must to give justice to over 10,000 people who are stuck in courts. Its not about whose fault but the way lower courts are. If one party wants to delay proceedings they can just take adjournments for years and years.. No one to help. Specially if the guy has asked for a divorce he is assumed to be gulity!
And no I am not a man. I am a woman who believes that women should not be put a in a category of “helpless”. There are enough women out there who can make a man’s life miserable. The woman is heard by everyone.. the man will not have any one to goto.
The divorce laws were made for the “abla naari” who was considered helpless in this country. I fail to understand how on a sensitive issue like marriage which deals with a person’s life such a view can be taken that Always the man is wrong. Cant a woman be ever wrong? Cant she misuse the system? Just because someone is a man he has to be the one at faulty?
We have now reasearched over a 1,000 cases pending in different courts where the following has come out:
1. Cases where the couple stayed together for less than 6 months and are still fighting a case for over 5 years. The woman is demanding huge amounts of money to let go of the husband. The girl takes adjournments after adjournments in the court. Infact in almost 200 cases no hearing had happened for over 2 years.. just because the girl does not come to court! If she is fighting the case and wants to go back then why use delay tactics?
2. Another 100 cases that are still pending for over 8 years.. The parties have lost out on 8 years of their life.. trying to achieve what? If the marriage has been irretrievably broken down then why cant they be allowed to part ways. This is just a sample it gives me Shivers to even think 1000’s of life that are just stuck.
3. Infact in one case the hudband had a decree of divorce from the lower court and the girl demanded a huge amount of money even to let go at the first appeal level. The guy has no job and she earns well. She thinks it is easy to hang the case in the court for more 10 years the way she has done already for 10 years. So she sends demand of huge money through her lawyers. Why cant the court intervne and get her alimnony? Why do courts keep such matters where lives are getting ruined every day pending for years together? Should not there be a time line to finish hearings in a certain time limit?
Is our system giving a legal right to a woman to black mail? The woman earns more than the husband and still wants huge amounts to let him go. Is this even fair? If mediation has failed over 10 years of fighting cases what are we trying to achieve here? Giving the woman a legal right to extract money even if the husband does not earn as much as her? In mediation the girl clearly says she cant live with him but she has filled to get maximum money out of him! So she admits that the marriage has irretrievably broken down in front of the mediation centre then files a case against the divorce. The point of an appeal is that she does not agree with the decree. But she says she only wants money.
Our Honorable Judges have a huge task while deciding a divorce case. They should not let the system get mis-used in a way that leads to torture of lives.
Someone who has tortured a guy and his family so much is it humanly possible for him to stay with that person in the same house? Also, if it has been over 10 years since the marriage broken down.
If someone makes a mistake of marrying a woman who thinks of it as a money making machine what does the guy do? Does he not have right to freedom? Right to live? Is he supposed to suffer endlessly for one mistake he did?
The constitution of India provides each one of us, right to freedom but the divorce laws are an absolute sentence for death. One mistake and we are dead for life. A girl can do what she wants and the man has no way to go.
This is just to bring out the importance of introduction of “irretrievable breakdown of marriag” as a law. Our Honourable Judges should be able to use their descrition in cases where there is cruelty and over 5 years have passed in legal battles.
